data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Barcelona to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Barcelona, Cataluña, Spain
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Barcelona, Cataluña, Spain that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Barcelona, Cataluña, Spain find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Barcelona, Cataluña, Spain to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Badalona
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Badalona, Cataluña, Spain.
Father, let those from the 87,874 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Barcelona, Cataluña, Spain.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the county of Barcelona, Cataluña, Spain has a population of 5,487,900.

We estimate Barcelona has 87,874 people who might know Jesus, 4,154,801 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,245,225 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 5,487,900 people living in Barcelona.
